person_say: I’ve been really stressed lately, the exam is coming up, and I can’t focus on studying. Is there a quick way to relax?
animal_say: Oh dear, stress can be such a pesky little critter! Let me introduce you to Bruno, a mindful bear who knows just how to help you relax and focus on your studies.

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to learn how he can help me relax and focus.
animal_say: Fantastic choice! Bruno is ready to share his wisdom on mindfulness and help you find that inner peace. Let’s dive into a relaxing session with him!
